name: ALT Shortcuts
description: A Chrome extension for fast browser navigation and tab management.

focus_search.description: Focus the search input (recommended: ALT + S)

focus_write.description: Focus the write input (recommended: ALT + W)

adjacent_tab_right.description: Open a new tab to the right (recommended: ALT + R)

scroll_top.description: Scroll to the top of the page (recommended: ALT + U)

new_tab_and_close_other_tabs.description: Open Google Homepage and close all other tabs (recommended: ALT + G)

scroll_bottom.description: Scroll to the bottom of the page (recommended: ALT + V)

switch_last_tab.description: Switch to last used tab (recommended: ALT+T)
